item.title: My trial version of Office has or is about to expire and I need to purchase the actual product.

details.detail: <p><span>You can purchase the product you need by doing so directly on&nbsp;</span><a class="topic" title="Microsoft Store" href="http://www.microsoftstore.com/">www.microsoftstore.com</a><span>&nbsp;and locating the product of interest or you can contact us directly to help you with the purchase process by <span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>contacting us</strong></span> at <strong>1-877-MY-MSSTORE</strong> (1-877-696-7787).</span></p>

item.title: I'm looking for my Product Key from a recent purchase made for my downloaded version of Microsoft Office product.
I have a question about how to use my Microsoft Product or trouble I'm having installing a Microsoft Product.

details.detail: <p><span>If you have questions or some challenges with using or installing your Microsoft Product we recommend starting at the following Microsoft Help and Support site&nbsp;</span><a class="topic" title="Microsoft Help and Support" href="http://support.microsoft.com/" target="_blank">http://support.microsoft.com/</a><span>. Here you will find FAQ's and additional support options by selecting the Microsoft Product of interest under the&nbsp;</span><strong>Solution Centers</strong><span>&nbsp;section. Upon reaching the Solution Center page for the product of interest you can then review existing FAQ's, forums or you can click on&nbsp;</span><strong>Contact a support professional by E-mail, Online, or Phone</strong><span>&nbsp;at the top right of each page and you will be presented with the proper support channels available to you for the product in question.</span></p>

item.title: I need a disc copy of my downloaded copy for my Microsoft Product.
I have not yet received my email confirmation invoice after purchasing my Microsoft Store product.
I'm having trouble downloading my product after purchasing on Microsoft Store.

details.detail: <p>You can start by reviewing the information at&nbsp;<a class="topic" title="Microsoft Store Help" href="http://www.microsoftstore.com/store/msstore/html/pbPage.Help">http://www.microsoftstore.com/store/msstore/html/pbPage.Help</a>&nbsp;under the&nbsp;<strong>Software Downloads</strong>&nbsp;or&nbsp;<strong>Download Manager</strong>&nbsp;sections for details around downloading your product.</p> <p>If you need additional assistance, please feel free to contact Microsoft Store at 1-877-MY-MSSTORE (1-877-696-7786).</p>

item.title: Whatâ€™s the difference between 32- and 64-bit versions of Windows?
How do I get status of my order?

details.detail: <p><span>Please go to&nbsp;</span><a title="Tracking Your Order" href="http://www.microsoftstore.com/store/msstore/html/pbPage.Help_Orders_Shipping" target="_blank">Tracking Your Order</a><span>.</span></p>

item.title: How do I return a product I purchased at the Microsoft Store?
I purchased a PC from Microsoft Store. How do I get technical support for Microsoft Signature?

details.detail: <p><span>To learn more about Microsoft&nbsp;</span><em>Signature</em><span>&nbsp;Premium, set up a new account, activate your membership or get additional assistance, please visit&nbsp;</span><a class="topic" title="Microsoft Signature Premium" href="http://signature.microsoft.com/" target="_blank">http://signature.microsoft.com</a><span>.</span></p>

item.title: How do I get help on my PC I purchased with Microsoft Signature?

details.detail: <p><span>To learn more about Microsoft&nbsp;</span><em>Signature</em><span>&nbsp;Premium, set up a new account, activate your membership or get additional assistance, please visit&nbsp;</span><a class="topic" title="Microsoft Signature Premium" href="http://signature.microsoft.com/" target="_blank">http://signature.microsoft.com</a><span>.</span></p>

item.title: How do I get my PC loaded with Microsoft Signature repaired?

details.detail: <p><span>Please go to&nbsp;</span><a class="topic" title="PC Repair" href="http://www.microsoftstore.com/store/msstore/html/pbPage.Help_Technical_Support#ms_help_topics_at2" target="_blank">PC Repair</a><span>.</span></p>

item.title: How do I start with Answer Desk?
